questions.question: You attended an event. Write an article for your blog.

answers.answer: Last saturday, I went to the Brussels' Book Fair. I board the train at the railwaystation with a travel ticket that cost only 6 euros because I am a senior traveller ( more than 65 years old ) .
At the fair, there was a lot of people . I had to wait at least 20 minutes before entering the book's realm.
There were all sorts of books : comics strips, polars, adventures, travels, history, geography, biographies and so on. There were also several authors who were present to dedicate their books.
I enjoyed very much my afternoon. I have only one regret : there was not a single book in english!
